permissions.name: Administer System
permissions.description: Ability to perform all administration functions for the instance: global configuration and personalization of default dashboards.

permissions.name: Administer Quality Profiles
permissions.description: Ability to perform any action on the quality profiles.

permissions.name: Administer Quality Gates
permissions.description: Ability to perform any action on the quality gates.

permissions.name: Execute Analysis
permissions.description: Ability to execute analyses, and to get all settings required to perform the analysis, even the secured ones like the scm account password, the jira account password, and so on.

permissions.name: Create Projects
permissions.description: Ability to initialize project structure before first analysis.
